tla: ssh?: only have term serv access - ie copy / paste
have RDP from local to TS then ssh from TS to target server.  cant xfer files to/from TS.  Can only copy/paste text

just figured out gpg is installed by default in ubuntu so using that the create an ascii armored file "gpg -a -c -o <outfile> <infile>" lets me paste it and the decrypt the other end with "gpg -d -o <outfile> <infile>".  works a treat ;)
